promise.ghg_emissions_directly_associated: Target to reduce greenhouse gas emissions (Scope 1 and 2) by 10% by Horizon 2025; 2024 progress toward the target is 6%.
promise.ghg_emission_scope_1: Target to reduce greenhouse gas emissions (Scope 1 and 2) by 10% by Horizon 2025; 2024 progress toward the target is 6%.
promise.energy_consumption: Target to reduce energy consumption by 10% (2019 baseline) by Horizon 2025; 2024 progress toward the target is 29%.
promise.water_usage: Target to reduce net water usage at facilities in water-stressed regions by 5% (2019 baseline); 2024 progress toward the target is 4%.
promise.worker_injury_rate: Continuous reduction in OSHA Total Recordable Rate; target to be lower than 2019 baseline; no numeric value provided.

ghg_emissions_directly_associated.description: Huntsman reports 60% collective progress toward Horizon 2025 targets in its 2023 Sustainability Report.
Investors’ press release for the 2023 Sustainability Report confirming 60% progress toward Horizon 2025 targets.
Horizon 2025 targets include a 10% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions (Scope 1+2 market-based) with a per-unit intensity metric showing 3% increase.
EPA settlement with Huntsman Advanced Materials LLC for Clean Water Act violations; $180,000 penalty, illustrating regulatory enforcement challenges outside GHG targets.

ghg_emission_scope_1.description: Huntsman press release stating 60% collective progress on Horizon 2025 targets as of 2023.
EPA settlement with Huntsman Advanced Materials Americas LLC for Clean Water Act permit violations; $180,000 penalty (2023).
Celanese's 2023 Scope 1 emissions are reported as 2,469,310 tCO2e on Tracenable's GHG emissions page, directly contradicting the 3,703,000 tCO2e figure.

Celanese 2024 Form 10-K notes updated gross Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions for 2021–2023 (including data from the M&M acquisition), indicating official Scope 1 data differ from the claimed 3,703,000 tCO2e.

ghg_emissions_directly_associated.description: Net Zero Tracker reports DuPont Scope 1 emissions of 1,870,000 tCO2e in 2021 and a Scope 1-2 location-based total of 3,144,000 tCO2e for 2021, contradicting the 496,000 tCO2e claim.

DuPont Sustainability Report page noting substantial absolute reductions in Scope 1 & 2 emissions since 2019 and the company’s net-zero commitments, which is consistent with higher absolute emissions prior to reductions and ongoing decarbonization efforts.

ghg_emission_scope_1.description: EPA settlement documenting Clean Air Act violations by DuPont and a civil penalty.
DOJ/EPA/Texas settlement with DuPont and PMNA for waste, water, and air law violations at Sabine River facility; civil penalty.
EPA information sheet on the La Porte, TX settlement addressing hazardous waste, air, and water violations; civil penalty.
DOJ press release describing the Sabine River facility settlement and required injunctive actions.
Environmental Crimes Bulletin noting a 2023 Clean Air Act case against DuPont with a criminal fine and probation.

energy_consumption.description: DuPont 2024 Sustainability Report showing total energy (GRI 302-1) for 2021–2023, including 2023 total energy of 4,425,196 MWh.
DuPont 2025 GRI Content Index confirming 2023 energy data (Total energy in MWh) and context for the reported figures.

fatalities.description: CSB page detailing the DuPont La Porte toxic chemical release; final investigation confirms fatalities and safety deficiencies.
CSB final report press release (June 25, 2019) confirming four fatalities and outlining process safety failures at the La Porte facility.
OSHA news release announcing penalties and the Severe Violator Enforcement Program status after the La Porte fatalities.
OSHA investigation report detailing 11 safety violations and fatalities at the La Porte facility, with proposed penalties.
Texas Tribune coverage of OSHA penalties and citations related to the DuPont La Porte incident.
SEC filing noting OSHA citations and settlement related to the La Porte incident, including penalties.

female_workforce_%.description: DuPont workforce diversity data: 25.3% female, contradicting a 32% claim.
DuPont demographics showing around 33–34% female, not 32%.

regulatory_investigations.description: Ohio Attorney General press release announcing a $110 million settlement with DuPont over PFAS releases and environmental restoration.
DuPont press release describing the Ohio natural-resource restoration settlement with DuPont, Chemours, and Corteva (DuPont share ~$39M).
Reuters report on New Jersey PFAS claims settlement involving Chemours, DuPont, and Corteva for $875 million.
CNBC article covering states suing 3M, DuPont over PFAS in drinking water as part of broader regulatory actions.
Reuters coverage of Connecticut firefighters filing PFAS-related suit against DuPont and other manufacturers.
SEC filing noting PFAS-related commitments and settlements, including Ohio-related actions and related environmental liabilities.

anti_competitive_behavior_fines.description: DOJ press release announcing DuPont Dow Elastomers' guilty plea and $84 million criminal fine for participating in a synthetic rubber cartel.
DOJ Antitrust Division case page for United States v. DuPont Dow Elastomers L.L.C., including plea information and charges related to price fixing.

number_of_financial_restatements.description: DuPont 2024 Form 10-K notes a restatement of previously issued consolidated financial statements (Note 15), covering prior periods such as 2023 and 2022.
DuPont 2025 Form 8-K includes Exhibit 99.1 with Explanatory Note about recasting the 2024 Form 10-K to reflect segment reporting changes, i.e., a restatement of prior period comparatives.

major_shareholder_lawsuits.description: Justia docket for Graham et al v. DuPont de Nemours, Inc. et al; lists Berkshire Hathaway, Inc. as a defendant in a contract dispute against DuPont.

ghg_emissions_directly_associated.description: SABIC 2022 Greenhouse Gas page showing Scope 1 emissions of 29,003,145 tCO2e in 2021 and 30,439,107 tCO2e in 2022.
SABIC 2020 Greenhouse Gas page reporting Scope 1 emissions of 36.7 million tCO2e.
SABIC 2019 Greenhouse Gas page showing historical Scope 1 emissions in the high 30s of million tCO2e (e.g., 2014–2019 data around 37–39 million tCO2e).

fatalities.description: Reuters report via Gulf News detailing 12 fatalities at Jubail United Petrochemical Co. (SABIC subsidiary).
Al Arabiya English coverage reporting 12 deaths and 11 injuries at United Petrochemical Co. (SABIC subsidiary).
Saudi Gazette reporting 12 fatalities and 11 injuries at Jubail United Petrochemical Co.
Arab News reporting 12 deaths and 11 injuries at United Petrochemical Co. plant in Jubail.

worker_injury_rate.description: Posey County SABIC plant worker burned by chemicals in 2022 (local news) indicating an injury occurred at a SABIC facility.
NL Times report: Dutch court fines SABIC Limburg €10 million for safety oversights; cites a 2016 fatality and 2019 injuries, illustrating serious injuries at SABIC sites.
NU.nl coverage: Openbaar Ministerie seeking €25 million fine for Sabic Limburg after fatal 2016 incident and related injuries.
NRC coverage: Prosecutors seek €25 million fine over safety incidents at Sabic Limburg (2015-2019), including a fatality and serious injuries.
